b.upload_id, c.name, region,hospital,b.file_name,b.month,if(b.file_name is null,'否','是') as isUpload,a.user_name
mapper.select:
select
from t_user where project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and role = 2

select
from t_user a LEFT JOIN t_upload b on a.user_id = b.user_id LEFT JOIN t_project c on a.project_id = c.project_id where a.role = 2 ORDER BY c.name, region,hospital,b.month,a.user_name

select
from t_user a LEFT JOIN t_upload b on a.user_id = b.user_id LEFT JOIN t_project c on a.project_id = c.project_id where a.role = 2 and c.name like '%${projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}%' ORDER BY c.name, region,hospital,b.month,a.user_name

select
from t_user a LEFT JOIN t_upload b on a.user_id = b.user_id LEFT JOIN t_project c on a.project_id = c.project_id where a.role = 2 and c.project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=CHAR} ORDER BY c.name, region,hospital,b.month,a.user_name

password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
